Reviews.Title: my first pro cam!
Reviews.Author: Nayeli Eleven
Reviews.Content: i have along way to go but so far this jewel is perfect! easy to use of a beginner and so perfect in size :)

ProductInfo.Features:
Fujifilm X20 Digital Camera (Silver)
0.45X Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD)
16GB Memory Card + High Speed Memory Card Reader + NP-50 Extended Life Replacement Battery
Full Size Tripod + Flexible Gripster Tripod + Table Top Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Cleaning Kit + SSE Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
Standard Slave Flash + Carrying Case
